languages.text: "Чем займусь? Продолжу вам служить и присматривать, чтобы вы не влезли в совсем уж беспросветные неприятности — хотя куда уж больше, чем сейчас?" {n}Абеляр мрачно усмехается.{/n} "Я принес клятву верности Леди Теодоре, а затем и вам. Так что место мое — подле Вольного Торговца, и нигде еще".

"What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."
languages.original_text: "Чем займусь? Продолжу вам служить и присматривать, чтобы вы не влезли в совсем уж беспросветные неприятности — хотя куда уж больше, чем сейчас?" {n}Абеляр мрачно усмехается.{/n} "Я принес клятву верности Леди Теодоре, а затем и вам. Так что место мое — подле Вольного Торговца, и нигде еще".

I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

"What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

languages.text: “我接下来该怎么做呢？我将继续为您服务，确保您不会陷入更大的麻烦，尽管我觉得这恐怕不太可能。”{n}阿贝拉德露出了严峻的微笑。{/n}“我宣誓效忠于西奥多拉夫人，之后又宣誓效忠于您。因此，我应该留在行商浪人身边，不该去别的地方。”
languages.original_text: "What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

traits.locale_text: “我接下来该怎么做呢？我将继续为您服务，确保您不会陷入更大的麻烦，尽管我觉得这恐怕不太可能。”{n}阿贝拉德露出了严峻的微笑。{/n}“我宣誓效忠于西奥多拉夫人，之后又宣誓效忠于您。因此，我应该留在行商浪人身边，不该去别的地方。”

languages.text: «¿Qué voy a hacer? Seguir sirviéndol{mf|e|a} y asegurarme de que no acaba metiéndose en una situación peor, aunque no soy capaz de imaginar una». {n}Abelard fuerza una risita.{/n} «Hice un juramento de lealtad a lady Theodora, y después a usted. Mi lugar está al lado de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, no en ninguna otra parte».
languages.original_text: "What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué voy a hacer? Seguir sirviéndol{mf|e|a} y asegurarme de que no acaba metiéndose en una situación peor, aunque no soy capaz de imaginar una». {n}Abelard fuerza una risita.{/n} «Hice un juramento de lealtad a lady Theodora, y después a usted. Mi lugar está al lado de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, no en ninguna otra parte».

languages.text: 「我はどうすればいいのでしょうか？陛下に仕え続け、御身が酷い事態に巻き込まれないよう見守るつもりでおりますが、どうすれば良いのかは見当もつきません」{n}アベラルドは顔をゆがめてクスッと笑う。{/n}「我はシオドーラ様に忠誠を誓い、その後、陛下にも忠誠を誓いました。ですから、我の居場所は自由開拓者のそばにのみあるのです」
languages.original_text: "What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

traits.locale_text: 「我はどうすればいいのでしょうか？陛下に仕え続け、御身が酷い事態に巻き込まれないよう見守るつもりでおりますが、どうすれば良いのかは見当もつきません」{n}アベラルドは顔をゆがめてクスッと笑う。{/n}「我はシオドーラ様に忠誠を誓い、その後、陛下にも忠誠を誓いました。ですから、我の居場所は自由開拓者のそばにのみあるのです」

languages.text: "Was soll ich tun? Ich werde Euch weiterhin dienen und dafür sehen, dass Ihr nicht in noch schlimmere Schwierigkeiten geratet, auch wenn ich nicht weiß, wie das überhaupt möglich wäre." {n}Abelard lacht düster.{/n} "Ich habe Lady Theodora die Treue geschworen und dann Euch. Daher ist mein Platz an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, sonst nirgendwo."
languages.original_text: "What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

traits.locale_text: "Was soll ich tun? Ich werde Euch weiterhin dienen und dafür sehen, dass Ihr nicht in noch schlimmere Schwierigkeiten geratet, auch wenn ich nicht weiß, wie das überhaupt möglich wäre." {n}Abelard lacht düster.{/n} "Ich habe Lady Theodora die Treue geschworen und dann Euch. Daher ist mein Platz an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, sonst nirgendwo."

languages.text: « Vous me demandez ce que je compte faire ? Continuer à vous servir et veiller à ce que vous ne vous attiriez pas davantage d'ennuis ; encore que, de ce côté-là, ce soit plutôt mal parti, {n}dit-il avec un petit rire amer.{/n} J'ai prêté serment de loyauté à dame Théodora, puis à vous. Par conséquent, ma place est aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et nulle part ailleurs. »
languages.original_text: "What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me demandez ce que je compte faire ? Continuer à vous servir et veiller à ce que vous ne vous attiriez pas davantage d'ennuis ; encore que, de ce côté-là, ce soit plutôt mal parti, {n}dit-il avec un petit rire amer.{/n} J'ai prêté serment de loyauté à dame Théodora, puis à vous. Par conséquent, ma place est aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et nulle part ailleurs. »

languages.text: "Ne mi yapacağım? Size hizmet etmeye ve başınızı daha da büyük belalara sokmamanızı sağlamaya çalışmaya devam edeceğim. Hoş, bundan büyük bela olur mu onu da bilmiyorum ya..." {n}Abelard, yüzünü buruşturarak gülüyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'ya, ardından da size sadakat yemini ettim. Dolayısıyla yerim Hür Tacir'in yanıdır, başka bir yer değil."
languages.original_text: "What am I going to do? I will continue to serve you and see that you do not get into even worse trouble, though I fail to see how that would be possible." {n}Abelard chuckles grimly.{/n} "I swore an oath of loyalty to Lady Theodora, and then to you. Therefore my place is at the Rogue Trader's side and nowhere else."
